about_the_game:
Become the best Anime Artist and expand your art collection even further!
This DLC adds 4 new levels to the game with additional artworks to Draw and Color!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Become the best Anime Artist and expand your art collection even further!
This DLC adds 4 new levels to the game with additional artworks to Draw and Color!
name: Anime Artist 3 - A better Artist

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Anime Artist 3 - A better Artist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 - 1.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Display 1280x720
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Processor 1.7 Ghz - AMD Processor 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Display 1920x1080
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Become the best Anime Artist and expand your art collection even further!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
